questions: Q. 1. What did political leaders and reformers like Jyotiba Phule, Gandhiji, B.R. Ambedker and Periyar Ramaswamy opposed ?  [Board Term 1, 2015, Set-C5JWEVD]
answers: Ans. Discrimination against the outcaste groups, caste inequalities. 1
